About.paragraph1: At Hanuman Action & Arts, we believe in the power of creativity to inspire, educate, and transform communities. Founded with the vision of blending art, technology, and social impact, we produce dynamic visual content that connects with audiences and drives change.
About.paragraph2: We work with NGOs, brands, and creative artists to bring stories to life through documentaries, films, 3D animation, VFX, reels, and sports event shoots. Whether it’s showcasing your impact, capturing a special event, or creating cutting-edge visuals, our team combines professionalism with cultural sensitivity and fresh ideas.

Services.name: Film and documentries making
Services.text: Turning your impact into powerful visual stories

Services.name: Graphic Design
Services.text: Creative visuals that elevate your brand identity.

Services.text: Engaging visuals for films, ads, and social campaigns

Services.text: Fast, creative storytelling for social media

Services.name: Music Production & Folk Arts
Services.text: Reviving traditions with a modern touch

Services.name: Wedding Shoot
Services.text: Turning your big day into forever memories.

Services.name: Live Streaming
Services.text: Your event, streamed to the world in real time.

Testimonials.text: "Highly impressed with the work done. Services offered are highly professional."
Testimonials.name: PRADAN

Testimonials.text: "Hanuman Art is an excellent agency providing high-quality services in the field of development documentaries. The agency has skilled, qualified, and highly cooperative professionals who genuinely understand the client’s needs and translate them effectively into impactful documentaries. Their prior experience in the development sector enables them to grasp the context quickly and bring authenticity to their work. I am very happy with the services provided by Hanuman Art and wish the team continued success in their future endeavors."
Testimonials.name: PRADAN DHAMTARI TEAM

Testimonials.text: "We would like to extend our appreciation for your recent performance and contribution. Your team displayed great energy, coordination, and professionalism throughout the event. The audience truly enjoyed the performance, and it added significant value to our program."
Testimonials.name: KABIR NAGAR KHEL SAMITI SOCIETY KABIR NAGAR RAIPUR

Team.name: Adarsh sharma
Team.text: Adarsh is a cinematographer driven by the art of visual storytelling and emotion through the lens With a strong sense of composition and lighting, he brings depth and atmosphere to every frame.
